alert.note: Alert for Dawes; North Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 6:57PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Dawes and northeastern Sioux Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 556 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fort Robinson Campground, or 32 miles west of Chadron, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locally heavy rainfall may result in localized flooding. Locations impacted include... Crawford, Fort Robinson Campground and Fort Robinson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
